title: From Paper to Personalized Insights
description: Tailoring design implications to individual designers' needs with generative AI
longDescription: This project explores how generative AI can support designers in crafting highly personalized solutions for design problems by analyzing user-specific requirements.

title: Agentic Workflow in Design
description: Persona-driven Collaborative Agents for Poster Design
longDescription: Agentic Workflow in Design leverages collaborative agents to create personas and streamline poster design processes. The system integrates machine learning with human creativity.
